response.original_title: American Steam: Vol. 3: Steam Giants Across America
response.overview: Footage of steam trains originally captured on 16mm film in the 40's and 50's, featuring locomotives on the Union Pacific, Duluth, Missabe & Iron Range, and Norfolk & Western, including Union Pacific's 8444 and the last runs of Norfolk & Western's 1218.
response.title: American Steam: Vol. 3: Steam Giants Across America
